summary: Build the Velora mobile app MVP: a soft, feminine relationship/self-growth program with a 30-day daily lesson flow, premium subscription unlocks, text message generator, journaling, and audio lessons, following the specified brand palette and typography.
architectural_notes: Brand styling: Blush Pink #F6C1C7, Warm Cream #FDF6EC, Soft Gold #D4AF7F, Muted Rose #E7A9B0
Typography: Headings Playfair Display; body Montserrat/Lato; affirmations/quotes Great Vibes
Monetization: subscription ₦2,500/month; free first 3 days of 30-day program; premium unlocks Text Softly, Journal, Audio Lessons; no ads at launch
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Subtle floral corner accent illustration, blush/rose/gold on transparent background (floral-corner-accent.dim_512x512.png)
- Minimalist soft-rose padlock icon on transparent background (icon-padlock-softrose.dim_128x128.png)
- Minimalist soft-pink heart icon on transparent background (icon-heart-softpink.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Implement the global Velora design system across the app: use the provided color palette (#F6C1C7 blush pink, #FDF6EC warm cream, #D4AF7F soft gold, #E7A9B0 muted rose), typography (Playfair Display for headings, Montserrat or Lato for body, Great Vibes for affirmations/quotes), rounded components, soft shadows, subtle gradients, gentle fade-in animations, and consistent spacing/layout patterns.

Create the Splash Screen UI with a blush pink gradient background, a typographic logo reading “Velora” (Playfair Display with a soft-gold accent treatment), the tagline “Love deeply. Stay whole.”, and a primary CTA button labeled “Start Your Journey” (cream background, blush text, rounded). Navigating via the CTA should move the user to the Welcome Screen.

Create the Welcome Screen where the user selects a relationship/status from exactly: “Single”, “In a relationship”, “Healing”, “Married”. Use a soft card layout with muted rose borders and a rounded gold “Continue” button. Persist the selected status for the user and proceed to the Home/Daily Program screen on Continue.

Implement the Home / Daily Program screen for a 30-day program: show a day header (e.g., “Day 1 – Your Soft Feminine Glow”), a lesson card (blush pink card with Playfair heading + Montserrat/Lato body), a centered daily affirmation rendered in Great Vibes with soft rose color, and Next/Previous navigation buttons with gold accents. The user must be able to move between days 1–30.

Implement premium gating rules and UI across the app: free users can access only the first 3 days of the 30-day program; premium users can access all 30 days plus Text Softly scripts, Journal, and Audio Lessons. Premium-only content must be clearly labeled/visually separated, and locked items must show padlock indicators. No ads should be shown anywhere in the MVP.

Create the Premium Features screen with tabs labeled exactly “Text Softly”, “Journal”, and “Audio Lessons”. Show locked content indicators (padlock icons) when the user is not premium. Include a primary CTA button labeled exactly “Unlock Full Program – ₦2,500/month” with a blush gradient background that initiates the premium upgrade flow in-app (MVP: implement as an app-internal upgrade action that toggles/stores premium status; no external ads).

Implement the Text Softly Generator screen: show category cards for exactly “Pull Away”, “Flirty”, “Apology”, “Missing You”, and “Boundaries”. When a category is chosen, display a randomly generated text message in a speech-bubble style. Include a favorite (heart) toggle for the displayed/generated message and maintain a per-user list of favorites. Access must be premium-gated per the monetization rules.

Implement the Journal screen with a lined-entry style on a cream background, header text exactly “My Private Thoughts” (Playfair Display), an “Add Entry” CTA styled as a rounded blush card with gold accent text, and a “Save” button styled as a soft rose bubble. Journal entries must be stored privately per user and gated to premium users.

Create the Profile / Settings screen with a blush pink fade background, user info including optional nickname, a subscription status indicator that shows a gold badge when premium, and settings options rendered with soft rose minimalist icons. Persist nickname and display it across the app where appropriate.

Add app-wide user identity support using Internet Identity so that status selection, premium status, favorites, and journal entries are stored per user principal. The app should handle signed-out state gracefully (e.g., allow browsing public/free portions, but require sign-in for saving personal data).

Implement Audio Lessons as a premium-gated section reachable from the Premium Features tabs. For the MVP, provide a simple list UI (titles + locked states for non-premium) consistent with the Velora theme; playback can be represented as non-functional placeholders unless audio assets are provided.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Splash Screen with Velora branding, tagline, and “Start Your Journey” CTA
Create Welcome Screen with relationship status selection (Single / In a relationship / Healing / Married) and Continue CTA
Implement Home/Daily Program screen with day header, lesson card, daily affirmation, and Next/Previous navigation
Implement Premium Features screen with tabs (Text Softly / Journal / Audio Lessons), locked content indicators, and subscription CTA (₦2,500/month)
Build Text Softly Generator with categories, random script generation, speech-bubble display, and favorites (heart icon)
Build Journal feature with private entries UI (lined style), add entry and save flows; gated for premium per monetization plan
Build Profile/Settings screen with optional nickname, subscription status badge, and settings options
Implement monetization rules: free access to first 3 days; premium unlocks full 30-day program + Text Softly + Journal + Audio lessons; no ads at launch
Apply global UI/UX styling: palette, fonts, rounded buttons, soft shadows, floral corner accents, subtle fade-in animations, and soft gradients across screens

Backend: implement Motoko canister APIs and stable storage for per-user profile (status, optional nickname, premium flag), Text Softly favorites, and journal entries. Ensure data survives canister upgrades using stable data patterns consistent with the single-actor architecture.
